contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Porte de Vanves |Pic=[[File:Metro Paris - Ligne 13 - Porte de Vanves.jpg|275px]] |Day=21 January |Year=1937 |Access= Avenue de la Porte de Vanves |Municipality=the 14th arrondissement of Paris |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|13|Plaisance|Malakoff - Plateau de Vanves }} | X=101 | Y=130 }} '''Porte de Vanves''' is a [[metro station|station]] on [[Paris Métro Line 13|line 13]] of the [[Paris Métro]] and a stop on [[Paris Tramway Line 3a|tramway line 3a]]. The station was opened on 21 January 1937 on old Line 14, which was absorbed into [[Paris Métro Line 13|13]] in 1976. It was the southern terminus of the line until its extension to [[Châtillon - Montrouge (Paris Métro)|Châtillon - Montrouge]] on 9 November 1976. In 2006, [[Paris Tramway Line 3]] (now 3a) opened, with a stop at ''Porte de Vanves''. It is named after the ''Porte de Vanves'', a [[City gates of Paris|gate]] in the nineteenth century [[Thiers wall]] of Paris, which led to the town of [[Vanves]]. ==Layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;" colspan=2|<center><small>[[Side Platform]] |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|[[File:Metro-M.svg|20px]] [[File:Paris m 13 jms.svg|20px]] towards [[Châtillon - Montrouge (Paris Métro)|Châtillon - Montrouge]] |- |[[File:Metro-M.svg|20px]] [[File:Paris m 13 jms.svg|20px]] towards [[Asnières – Gennevilliers – Les Courtilles (Paris Métro)|Asnières – Gennevilliers – Les Courtilles]] or [[Saint-Denis - Université (Paris Métro)|Saint-Denis - Université]] |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" colspan=2|<center><small>[[Side Platform]] |} ==Gallery== <gallery widths="200px" heights="125px" perrow="2"> File:Paris Metro Porte de Vanves.jpg|Line 13 platforms at Porte de Vanves </gallery> [[File:Paris PortedeVanves.jpg|thumb|center|475px|T3a tram at Porte de Vanves]] {{commons category|Porte de Vanves (Paris Metro)}} ==References== *Roland, Gérard (2003).
